Class w3c.thotlib.AttributeType 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.thotlib.AttributeType
public class AttributeType
extends Object
Java Classe associated to an AttributeType of an Attribute.

An attribute type native object is basically a simple structure containing the SSchema and the attribute type number.

AttributeType()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.
AttributeType(Attribute)
Create a new attribute type using an existing Attribute, NOT IMPLEMENTED.
AttributeType(int)
Create a new (incomplete) attribute type.
AttributeType(long, int)
Create a new (incomplete) attribute type.
AttributeType(String)
Create a new attribute type using it's external name, NOT IMPLEMENTED.

get_sschema(int)
Only for native accesses.
get_sschema(long)
Only for native accesses.
get_type()
Only for native accesses.
Name()
Gives the external name of an AttributeType, NOT IMPLEMENTED.
set_sschema(int)
Only for native accesses.
set_sschema(long)
Only for native accesses.
set_type(int)
Only for native accesses.

AttributeType 
 public AttributeType()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.

AttributeType 
 public AttributeType(int t)
Create a new (incomplete) attribute type.

Parameters:
t - the attribute type number (w.r.t. the document SSchema)
AttributeType 
 public AttributeType(long s,
                      int t)
Create a new (incomplete) attribute type.

Parameters:
s - the SSchema
t - the attribute type number (w.r.t. the document SSchema)
AttributeType 
 public AttributeType(Attribute el)
Create a new attribute type using an existing Attribute, NOT IMPLEMENTED.

Parameters:
el - the Attribute
AttributeType 
 public AttributeType(String TypeName)
Create a new attribute type using it's external name, NOT IMPLEMENTED.

Parameters:
el - the Attribute

Name 
 public String Name()
Gives the external name of an AttributeType, NOT IMPLEMENTED. return the string associated if found, or null.
